articles.name: doing-magic-with-ravendb
articles.heading: Doing magic with RavenDB
articles.teaser: Exploring the surface of a document database.
articles.ingressHtml: This ingress cuts out the first paragraph tag
articles.bodyHtml:
RavenDB is a document database for .NET.

It might be nicer than MongoDB
